properties.description: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London and within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes and National Trust woodland. The property comprises; two receptions, fitted 18'9 x 10'1 kitchen/breakfast room and conservatory. The property also benefits from having a utility room and cloakroom. To the first floor there are three bedrooms and a family bathroom with separate WC. Additional features include double glazing, gas central heating and a well presented interior...
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington BR5

properties.description: Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat. The modern fitted kitchen is open plan to the living room which boasts solid wooden floors and includes integrated appliances including a dishwasher & a washing machine. This large open plan benefits from bi folding doors onto a secluded private courtyard garden. Both bedrooms are double sized, and the family bathroom boasts a matching three piece suite a shower attachment over the bath.

Spacious 4-bedroom Victorian home with original features including high ceilings and fireplaces. The property has a newly renovated kitchen, a large private garden, and a garage. Located in a quiet residential area, it is perfect for growing families looking for character and space.
properties.location: Bickley Park Road, Bickley, Bromley BR1

properties.description: A luxury 1-bedroom apartment situated in the heart of the town center. This modern property features floor-to-ceiling windows, a concierge service, and access to a residents' gym. Ideal for young professionals commuting to the city.

An immaculate 5-bedroom detached house offering over 2500 sq ft of living space. Features include a cinema room, triple garage, and a stunning landscaped garden. The master suite includes a walk-in wardrobe and a luxury en-suite bathroom.
Charming 2-bedroom conversion flat within a period property. Features include sash windows, a separate kitchen, and access to a communal garden. Located just minutes from local parks and amenities.

A delightful 3-bedroom terraced house in a popular catchment area for schools. The property offers two reception rooms, a modern kitchen, and a south-facing garden. Excellent transport links to Central London.
